Articles.Content: I have been having this problem with the rockomax booster-that-i-cant-name. [http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/541898206723640099/8EAFCF3EFB4C0A6C1FF05551E6F3622AB6313445/1024x576.resizedimage](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/541898206723640099/8EAFCF3EFB4C0A6C1FF05551E6F3622AB6313445/1024x576.resizedimage) I had to do some detailed STS-SRB research. I dont know if this is a stock issue or a modded issue but better be safe then sorry. Heres my mods. NOTE: CKAN disables mods and stuff. So most of the mods are inactive. You can tell me if you want clarification of mods that are active and arent. Go ahead. ![1024x452.resizedimage](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/541898206723681814/014CABED8D72B3B5C2E19D497072D63DC7658E36/1024x452.resizedimage)

I also appear to be having this problem.

Anyone?

From the picture, I'd say that this is an issue involving either textures or lighting.

It it's mod-related, I'd investigate on anything touching those SRBs, exhaust textures (for example: Smoke Screen and mods based on it) or even textures in general.

I'm not going to be of much more help here, I'm afraid, as I'm not really good in texture stuff :/

Though, if, windows\_x\_seven, you could list your mods, it might be possible to find a common point and a hint on the cause.
